metadata.Title: CVE-2015-1379 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.Description: The signal handler implementations in socat before 1.7.3.0 and 2.0.0-b8 allow remote attackers to cause a denial of service (process freeze or crash). It was discovered that socat incorrectly handled signals. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service.

criterions.comment: socat package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.7.3.2-2ubuntu2').
